verses.verse: Then again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Avraham <S%H85><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%>, and her name <S%H8034><s%> was Keturah <S%H6989><s%>.
And she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him Zimran <S%H2175><s%>, and Jokshan <S%H3370><s%>, and Medan <S%H4091><s%>, and Midian <S%H4080><s%>, and Ishbak <S%H3435><s%>, and Shuah <S%H7744><s%>.

And Jokshan <S%H3370><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> SH'va <S%H7614><s%>, and Dedan <S%H1719><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dedan <S%H1719><s%> were Asshurim <S%H805><s%>, and Letushim <S%H3912><s%>, and Leummim <S%H3817><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>; Ephah <S%H5891><s%>, and Epher <S%H6081><s%>, and Hanoch <S%H2585><s%>, and Abida <S%H28><s%>, and Eldaah <S%H420><s%>. All these were the children <S%H1121><s%> of Keturah <S%H6989><s%>.
And Avraham <S%H85><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all that he had unto Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>.

But unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the concubines <S%H6370><s%>, which Avraham <S%H85><s%> had, Avraham <S%H85><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%>, and sent them away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> from Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, while he yet lived <S%H2416><s%>, eastward <S%H6924><s%>, unto the east <S%H6924><s%> country <S%H776><s%>.

And these are the days <S%H3117><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> of Avraham's <S%H85><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> which he lived <S%H2425><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> threescore and fifteen <S%H7657><s%> <S%H8141><s%> <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

Then Avraham <S%H85><s%> gave up the ghost <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> old age <S%H7872><s%>, an old man <S%H2205><s%>, and full <S%H7649><s%> of years; and was gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And his sons <S%H1121><s%> Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> and Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zohar <S%H6714><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, which is before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>;

The field <S%H7704><s%> which Avraham <S%H85><s%> purchased <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Heth <S%H2845><s%>: there was Avraham <S%H85><s%> buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, and Sarah <S%H8283><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Avraham <S%H85><s%>, that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>; and Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by <S%H5973><s%> the well Lahairoi <S%H883><s%>.

Now these are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%>, Avraham's <S%H85><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, whom Hagar <S%H1904><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, Sarah's <S%H8283><s%> handmaid <S%H8198><s%>, bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Avraham <S%H85><s%>:

And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%>, by their names <S%H8034><s%>, according to their generations <S%H8435><s%>: the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%>, Nebajoth <S%H5032><s%>; and Kedar <S%H6938><s%>, and Adbeel <S%H110><s%>, and Mibsam <S%H4017><s%>,
And Mishma <S%H4927><s%>, and Dumah <S%H1746><s%>, and Massa <S%H4854><s%>,
Hadar <S%H2316><s%>, and Tema <S%H8485><s%>, Jetur <S%H3195><s%>, Naphish <S%H5305><s%>, and Kedemah <S%H6929><s%>:

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%>, and these are their names <S%H8034><s%>, by their towns <S%H2691><s%>, and by their castles <S%H2918><s%>; twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> according to their nations <S%H523><s%>.

And these are the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he gave up the ghost <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and was gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And they dwelt <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Havilah <S%H2341><s%> unto Shur <S%H7793><s%>, that is before <S%H6440><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, as thou goest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> toward Ashur <S%H804><s%>: and he died <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of all his brethren <S%H251><s%>.
And these are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, Avraham's <S%H85><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>: Avraham <S%H85><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>:

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> was forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the Syrian <S%H761><s%> of Padanaram <S%H6307><s%>, the sister <S%H269><s%> to Laban <S%H3837><s%> the Syrian <S%H761><s%>.

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> intreated <S%H6279><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H5227><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, because she was barren <S%H6135><s%>: and the YY <S%H3068><s%> was intreated <S%H6279><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of him, and Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> struggled together <S%H7533><s%> <S%H8704><s%> within her <S%H7130><s%>; and she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, If it be so, why am I thus <S%H2088><s%>? And she went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to enquire <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, Two <S%H8147><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> are in thy womb <S%H990><s%>, and two manner <S%H8147><s%> of people <S%H3816><s%> shall be separated <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8735><s%> from thy bowels <S%H4578><s%>; and the one people <S%H3816><s%> shall be stronger <S%H553><s%> <S%H8799><s%> than the other people <S%H3816><s%>; and the elder <S%H7227><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the younger <S%H6810><s%>.
And when her days <S%H3117><s%> to be delivered <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8800><s%> were fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, behold, there were twins <S%H8380><s%> in her womb <S%H990><s%>.

And the first <S%H7223><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> red <S%H132><s%>, all over like an hairy <S%H8181><s%> garment <S%H155><s%>; and they called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> that came <S%H3318><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> took hold <S%H270><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on Esav's <S%H6215><s%> heel <S%H6119><s%>; and his name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>: and Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> was threescore <S%H8346><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them.

And the boys <S%H5288><s%> grew <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and Esav <S%H6215><s%> was a cunning <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hunter <S%H6718><s%>, a man <S%H376><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>; and Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> was a plain <S%H8535><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, dwelling <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%>.

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%>, because he did eat <S%H6310><s%> of his venison <S%H6718><s%>: but Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>.
And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> sod <S%H2102><s%> <S%H8686><s%> pottage <S%H5138><s%>: and Esav <S%H6215><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the field <S%H7704><s%>, and he was faint <S%H5889><s%>:

And Esav <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, Feed <S%H3938><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me, I pray thee, with <S%H4480><s%> that same <S%H122><s%> red <S%H122><s%> pottage; for I am faint <S%H5889><s%>: therefore was his name <S%H8034><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Edom <S%H123><s%>.
And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Sell <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me this day <S%H3117><s%> thy birthright <S%H1062><s%>.

And Esav <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold, I am at the point <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: and what profit shall this birthright <S%H1062><s%> do to me?

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Swear <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8734><s%> to me this day <S%H3117><s%>; and he sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto him: and he sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his birthright <S%H1062><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>.

Then Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and pottage <S%H5138><s%> of lentiles <S%H5742><s%>; and he did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went his way <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: thus Esav <S%H6215><s%> despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his birthright <S%H1062><s%>.
